byline.contributor: Jesse McKinley reported from Willsboro, and Benjamin Mueller from New York. William K. Rashbaum contributed reporting, and Susan C. Beachy and Alain Delaquérière contributed research.
byline.original: By JESSE McKINLEY and BENJAMIN MUELLER

abstract: Manhunt continues for escaped convicts Richard W Matt and David Sweat as law enforcement and corrections officers thoroughly search area around Willsboro, NY, in response to report of two men walking on rural road.
lead_paragraph: After a report of a sighting of two men on foot, law enforcement officials descended on the town, about an hour from Clinton Correctional Facility, where two prisoners escaped over the weekend.

headline.main: Police Swarm Willsboro, N.Y., in Search of Escaped Killers
headline.print_headline: 2 Escapees Still at Large Despite 450-Officer Hunt in Remote, Swampy Area

snippet: After a report of a sighting of two men on foot, law enforcement officials descended on the town, about an hour from Clinton Correctional Facility, where two prisoners escaped over the weekend.
